line.comment: * Zero Hour 1.10 - player owned, OCV made fleet leaders (!fight.defend.monitor) or followers (scanning range handled in ZH.Task.FleetCommander) do not attack Terraformer made ships
* !fight.defend.sector from Patrol Sectors, Invade Sector and Attack All Enemies fleet commands.
* player owned, but OCV made ship
* we can already return null if the closest ship is out of range
* after you could not find your preferred ship class you just go for a default target

sval.val: Zero Hour 1.10 - player owned, OCV made fleet leaders (!fight.defend.monitor) or followers (scanning range handled in ZH.Task.FleetCommander) do not attack Terraformer made ships
!fight.defend.sector from Patrol Sectors, Invade Sector and Attack All Enemies fleet commands.
player owned, but OCV made ship
we can already return null if the closest ship is out of range
after you could not find your preferred ship class you just go for a default target
